Hey team, looking to work with James Wilson for KFC. Budget is approx $7,841 - need 1 x Facebook post, 1 x YouTube short, 1 x YouTube short, 2 x Instagram story. 9 weeks exclusivity, 6 month engagement. Usage: 9 months. Start date: September 2025. Additional notes: TBC on exact dates, around $7,841 budget
